attributes.action: Regulate Residential Flat Block Management Practices
attributes.additional_details:
Government oversight is essential to ensure fairness in residential block management. Many companies inflate fees, add unfair markups, and avoid accountability, leaving residents powerless to challenge them. Regulations can cap charges, allow monthly payments, and require resident meetings, protecting leaseholders from exploitation and ensuring transparency in the system.
Also if Leaseholders want to change the Management Company often they are not allowed or locked in for years. Delaying Sales
attributes.background: The government should regulate residential block management by capping fees, requiring transparency, allowing monthly payments without penalties, mandating resident meetings, and enforcing accountability to protect leaseholders from exploitation and ensure fair practices.
